scripts.prepare-uniswap-v2-mainnet: mustache ./config/uniswap-v2-mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-sushiswap-mainnet: mustache ./config/sushiswap-mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-sushiswap-polygon: mustache ./config/sushiswap-polygon.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-quickswap-polygon: mustache ./config/quickswap-polygon.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-trisolaris-aurora: mustache ./config/trisolaris-aurora.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-pancakeswap-bsc: mustache ./config/pancakeswap-bsc.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy-uniswap-v2-mainnet: npm run prepare-uniswap-v2-mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ simplefi-finance/simplefi-uniswap-v2
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-mainnet: npm run prepare-sushiswap-mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ simplefi-finance/simplefi-sushiswap
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-polygon: npm run prepare-sushiswap-polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ simplefi-finance/simplefi-sushiswap-polygon
scripts.deploy-quickswap-polygon: npm run prepare-quickswap-polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ simplefi-finance/simplefi-quickswap
scripts.deploy-trisolaris-aurora: npm run prepare-trisolaris-aurora && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ simplefi-finance/simplefi-trisolaris
scripts.deploy-pancakeswap-bsc: npm run prepare-pancakeswap-bsc && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ simplefi-finance/pancakeswap-bsc
